auth.sign_in_subtitle: Unable to sign in? Contact your administrator.
auth.login_error: Login failed. Please check your credentials and try again.

password_reset.title: Reset your password
password_reset.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a verification code to reset your password
password_reset.success_message: If an account with this email exists, we've sent a password reset code to your email address
password_reset.success_description: The email contains a 6-digit code and a link to reset your password. If you don't see it, check your spam folder.
password_reset.error_message: Failed to send password reset email. Please try again.

validate.title: Reset your password
validate.subtitle: Enter the 6-digit verification code from your email and choose a new password
validate.success_message: Your password has been reset successfully. You are now logged in and will be redirected to the homepage.
validate.error_code_length: Verification code must be exactly 6 digits
validate.error_validation_failed: Invalid verification code or failed to reset password. Please try again.
validate.error_new_password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
validate.footer_text: Didn't receive the code? Check your spam folder or request a new one

homepage.subtitle: Ready to transfer and share your files securely

tutorial.title: Tutorial: How to Transfer Files
tutorial.video_description: A comprehensive guide to file transfers

delete_dialog.title: Move {{fileName}} to trash?
delete_dialog.description: This file will be moved to trash and can be restored within 7 days. After 7 days, it will be permanently deleted.

messages.bucket_created: Created a bucket '%%BUCKET_NAME%%' and shared it with you.
messages.file_uploaded: Uploaded a file '%%FILE_NAME%%' on the bucket '%%BUCKET_NAME%%'.
messages.file_downloaded: Downloaded a file '%%FILE_NAME%%' on the bucket '%%BUCKET_NAME%%'.
messages.file_updated: Updated a file '%%FILE_NAME%%' on the bucket '%%BUCKET_NAME%%'.
messages.file_deleted: Deleted a file '%%FILE_NAME%%' on the bucket '%%BUCKET_NAME%%'.
messages.file_trashed: Moved a file '%%FILE_NAME%%' to trash on the bucket '%%BUCKET_NAME%%'.
messages.file_restored: Restored a file '%%FILE_NAME%%' from trash on the bucket '%%BUCKET_NAME%%'.
messages.file_purged: Permanently deleted a file '%%FILE_NAME%%' from the bucket '%%BUCKET_NAME%%'.
messages.folder_trashed: Moved a folder '%%FILE_NAME%%' to trash on the bucket '%%BUCKET_NAME%%'.
messages.folder_restored: Restored a folder '%%FILE_NAME%%' from trash on the bucket '%%BUCKET_NAME%%'.
messages.folder_purged: Permanently deleted a folder '%%FILE_NAME%%' from the bucket '%%BUCKET_NAME%%'.
messages.bucket_member_updated: Updated the group of %%BUCKET_MEMBER_EMAIL%% on the bucket '%%BUCKET_NAME%%'.

new_bucket_dialog.title: New bucket
new_bucket_dialog.description: Create a bucket to share files safely

header.upload_and_share: Upload a file and share it safely

grid_view.empty_description: Upload files or create folders to get started organizing your content.
grid_view.drag_drop_hint: You can also drag and drop files here to upload them.

trash_view.name: Name
trash_view.empty_description: Deleted files will appear here and be automatically removed after 7 days.
trash_view.retention_notice: Files in trash will be automatically deleted after 7 days. You can restore them before then.
trash_view.confirm_delete_description: Are you sure you want to permanently delete "{{fileName}}"? This action cannot be undone.

deletion.title: Delete this bucket
deletion.description: This will permanently delete the bucket and all the associated files. This action cannot be undone.

members.title: Bucket Members
members.description: Manage who has access to this bucket and their permissions

drag_drop.drop_files: Drop files or folders to upload
drag_drop.drop_description: Files and folders will be uploaded to the current directory

upload.permission_denied: You don't have permission to upload files to this bucket

profile.title: Profile Information
profile.description: Manage your personal information and account settings
profile.password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters

smart_enrollment.title: Join with your account
smart_enrollment.description: Choose your preferred sign-in method to accept this invitation
smart_enrollment.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
smart_enrollment.send_error: Failed to send verification code. Please try again.
smart_enrollment.footer_text: By continuing, you accept this invitation and agree to create an account
smart_enrollment.success_message: We've sent a verification code to your email address
smart_enrollment.success_description: The email contains a 6-digit code and a link to accept the invitation. If you don't see it, check your spam folder.

accept.title: Accept Invitation
accept.subtitle: Enter the 6-digit verification code from your email and create your password
accept.success_message: Your account has been created successfully. You are now logged in and will be redirected to the homepage.
accept.error_code_length: Verification code must be exactly 6 digits
accept.error_validation_failed: Invalid verification code or failed to create account. Please try again.
accept.error_new_password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
accept.footer_text: Didn't receive the code? Check your spam folder or request a new one

users.title: User Management
users.description: Manage all users in the system

delete_dialog.title: Delete User
delete_dialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete {{email}}? This action cannot be undone.
